sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent>
    <custom-button onclick="addRow">Add Row</custom-button>
  </form>
  <table-component/>
</template>

<script>
import TableComponent from './components/TableComponent.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    TableComponent
  },
  methods: {
    addRow: async (table) => {
      const $host = axios.create({
                baseURL: process.env.VUE_APP_API_URL
            })
        const data = await $host.post('api/table', table)
        return data
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
  @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins&display=swap');

  * {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
  }

  body {
    padding: 5% 10%;
    background: #f5f5f5;
  }
</style>
